item.title: PM Modi, Singapore PM inaugurate India’s largest container port in Mumbai

review.headline_rewrite: PM Modi, Singapore PM inaugurate India’s largest container port in Mumbai
bullets: MICL secured the development contract through a competitive tender in June 2023 under a public-private partnership model.
MICL reported consolidated total income of ₹1,360 crores and net profit of ₹300 crores in the last financial year.
